subtask.title: Research available AI chatbot platforms compatible with FreshService
subtask.objective: Identify suitable AI chatbot solutions or platforms that can be integrated with FreshService, considering open options and APIs.
subtask.scope: Compare features, integration options, APIs, and costs of platforms like ServiceNow Virtual Agent, Freshworks AI, or third-party chatbots.

verification.completion_summary: The research has gathered extensive information on AI chatbot platforms compatible with FreshService, including integration examples, case studies, API details, best practices, and specific solutions like Gaspar AI, Freddy AI, and BotDojo. It covers multiple solutions, integration methods, and practical implementations.

covered_aspects: Identification of suitable AI chatbot solutions compatible with FreshService
Comparison of features, integration options, APIs, and costs
Inclusion of open-source and third-party platforms
Consideration of real-world case studies and success stories
Outline of best practices for integration and deployment
missing_aspects: Explicit cost analysis and detailed pricing comparisons of platforms
A direct, structured feature-by-feature comparison table
Specific API technical specifications and limitations for each platform
Assessment of scalability and long-term support for each solution

missing_requirements: Explicit API technical specifications and constraints
Evaluation of platform scalability and long-term viability
